mapper.sql:
FROM infrMember a LEFT JOIN infrMemberEmail b ON b.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq AND ifmeDefaultNy = 1 WHERE ifmmDelNy = 0
AND ifmmName like concat('%',#{searchBar},'%') AND ifmmId like concat('%',#{searchBar},'%') AND b.ifmeEmailFull LIKE concat('%',#{searchBar},'%')
AND ifmmEmailConsentNy = 1
AND ifmmSmsConsentNy = 1
AND ifmmPushConsentNy = 1
AND 1=1 AND ifmmGradeCd = 76 AND ifmmGradeCd = 77
AND ifmmId LIKE concat('%',#{shIfmmId},'%')
ORDER BY a.ifmmSeq
ORDER BY a.ifmmSeq desc
ORDER BY ifmmId
ORDER BY ifmmId desc
ORDER BY ifmmName
ORDER BY ifmmName desc
ORDER BY ifmmGradeCd
ORDER BY ifmmGradeCd desc
ORDER BY ifmmRegDate
ORDER BY ifmmRegDate desc
mapper.select:
SELECT a.ifmmSeq , a.ifmmName , a.ifmmId , (select ifcdName from infrCode where ifcdSeq = a.ifmmGenderCd) as ifmmGenderName , a.ifmmDob , a.ifmmFavoriteColor , a.ifmmDelNy , (select ifcdName from infrCode where ifcdSeq = a.ifmmGradeCd) as ifmmGrade , a.ifmmRegDate , (select ifcdName from infrCode where ifcdSeq = a.ifmmStatusCd) as ifmmStatus , b.ifmeEmailFull
LIMIT #{startRnumForMysql}, #{rowNumToShow}
SELECT ifnaSeq , ifnaName , ifnaCode2Char , ifnaCode3Char FROM infrNationality WHERE 1 = 1 AND ifnaUseNy = 1 AND ifnaDelNy = 0

SELECT ifntSeq , ifntOrder , ifntContent , (select ifmmName from infrMember a where a.ifmmSeq = ifntWriterCd) AS ifntWriter , regDateTime AS noteDateTime FROM infrMemberNote WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq} AND ifntUseNy = 1 AND ifntDelNy = 0

SELECT DISTINCT a.ifmmSeq , a.ifmmName , a.ifmmId , a.ifmmPwd , (select ifcdName from infrCode where ifcdSeq = a.ifmmGenderCd) as ifmmGenderName , a.ifmmDob , a.ifmmFavoriteColor , a.ifmmDelNy , (select ifcdName from infrCode where ifcdSeq = a.ifmmGradeCd) as ifmmGrade , a.ifmmRegDate , (select ifcdName from infrCode where ifcdSeq = a.ifmmStatusCd) as ifmmStatus , if(a.ifmmEmailConsentNy=1,'수신동의','수신거부') as ifmmEmailConsentNyText , if(a.ifmmSmsConsentNy=1,'수신동의','수신거부') as ifmmSmsConsentNyText , if(a.ifmmPushConsentNy=1,'수신동의','수신거부') as ifmmPushConsentNyText
, b.ifmeEmailFull , b.ifmeEmailAccount , b.ifmeEmailDomain , b.ifmeEmailDomainCd
, d.ifmaZipCode , d.ifmaAddress1 , d.ifmaAddress2 , d.ifmaAddressReferences
, e.ifnaSeq , (select ifnaName from infrNationality where ifnaSeq = e.ifnaSeq) as ifnaName , (select ifnaCode2Char from infrNationality where ifnaSeq = e.ifnaSeq) as ifnaCode2Char , (select ifnaCode3Char from infrNationality where ifnaSeq = e.ifnaSeq) as ifnaCode3Char
FROM infrMember a LEFT JOIN infrMemberEmail b ON b.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq AND b.ifmeDefaultNy = 1
LEFT JOIN infrMemberAddress d ON d.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq AND d.ifmaDefaultNy = 1 LEFT JOIN infrMemberNationality e ON e.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq AND e.ifmnDefaultNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}

SELECT (select ifcdName from infrCode where b.ifmpTelecomCd = ifcdSeq) as ifmpTelecomName , ifmpNumber as ifmpNumberMobile FROM infrMember a LEFT JOIN infrMemberPhone b ON b.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq} AND b.ifmpDeviceCd = 26 AND b.ifmpDefaultNy = 1

SELECT (select ifcdName from infrCode where b.ifmpTelecomCd = ifcdSeq) as ifmpTelecomName , ifmpNumber as ifmpNumberHome FROM infrMember a LEFT JOIN infrMemberPhone b ON b.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq} AND b.ifmpDeviceCd = 25 AND b.ifmpDefaultNy = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO infrMemberNote ( ifmmSeq , ifntOrder , ifntContent , ifntWriterCd , regDateTime , ifntUseNy , ifntDelNy ) VALUES ( #{ifmmSeq} , (SELECT ifnull(max(a.ifntOrder),0) + 1 FROM infrMemberNote a WHERE a.ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}) , #{ifntContent} , 1 , now() , 1 , 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE infrMemberPhone SET ifmpNumber = #{ifmpNumberMobile} , ifmpDeviceCd = 26 , ifmpDefaultNy = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq} AND ifmpDeviceCd = 26
UPDATE infrMemberPhone SET ifmpNumber = #{ifmpNumberHome} , ifmpDeviceCd = 25 , ifmpDefaultNy = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq} AND ifmpDeviceCd = 25
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM infrMember WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmSeq = #{checkbox1}
DELETE FROM infrMemberEmail WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmSeq = #{checkbox1}
DELETE FROM infrMemberAddress WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmSeq = #{checkbox1}
DELETE FROM infrMemberPhone WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmSeq = #{checkbox1}
DELETE FROM infrMemberNationality WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmSeq = #{checkbox1}
DELETE FROM infrMemberNote WHERE 1=1 AND ifntSeq = #{checkboxMemo}
mapper.update: SET @ifntOrder:=0; UPDATE infrMembernote SET ifntOrder = @ifntOrder:=@ifntOrder+1 WHERE ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq} ORDER BY ifntOrder
UPDATE infrMember SET ifmmDelNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmSeq = #{checkbox1}
